description: T1. Oak - tree overhanging from neighbouring property which is overhanging the road. To lift the lower canopy to 3 metres, cut back lateral branches so they are no longer overhanging the road and to clear around the street lamp.T2. London Plane - to lift the lower canopy over the road, including removal of one large limb growing towards the building, reduce the crown by 30% and thin by 10% T3. London Plane - to lift the lower canopy by removing the six lowest limbs, reduce the crown by 30% and thin by 10% T4. London Plane / T11.Maple / T14.Acer / T15.Acer / T17.Ash / T18.Ash / T19.Maple :-- to reduce the crown by 30%, thin by 10% and lift the lower canopy to 4 metresT5. Maple/T6.Maple /T7.London Plane/T8.London Plane /T9.Ash /T12.London Plane /T13.Maple /T16.London Plane/T21.London Plane/T22.London Plane:-- to reduce the crown by 30%, cutting back from the building to give 3 metres clearance, thin by 10% and lift the lower canopy to 4 metres T10. Maple - to reduce the crown by 30%, cutting back from the building to give 2 metres clearance, thin by 10% and lift the lower canopy to 4 metres 20. Maple - to reduce the crown by 30%, cutting back from the building to give 3 metres clearance and cutting back to give good clearance from the Bus Stop, thin by 10% and lift the lower canopy to 4 metres23. Sorbus - dead - to fell to ground level T24.Lime/T25.Lime/T26. Lime:- - to lift the lower canopy to 3 metres to clear the parking bays, footpath and road
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
